## Welcome to R'tichoke

R'tichoke is a repository of R programming content, tutorials, and resources. Whether you're just starting your journey with R or you're an experienced data scientist looking to expand your toolkit, you'll find valuable content here to help you grow your skills.

## Latest Articles

Check out the [blog](/posts.qmd) for tutorials and tips on R programming.

## Getting Started

New to R? Start here:

1. [Installing R and RStudio](/installation.qmd) - Set up your development environment
2. [Introduction to Analytics with R](/posts/intro-to-r-analytics.qmd) - Learn the basics
3. [Data Wrangling with dplyr](/get-started/data-wrangling-with-dplyr.qmd) - Level up your data manipulation skills
4. [Interactive R in Your Browser with WebR](/webr.html) - Try out R right in your browser!
